籤詩版本二:
Wazijula ​​kwisango letorii eliqingqiweyo phantsi kwelitye ukuze ambuyisele indoda.
Ngubani onokuyifumana xa ucebe kwangethuba, akukho mntu unokulihamba ilizwe.
詩意:
Le hexagram ibeka umfanekiso wentaka yobhedu etyeni.
Uphawu lwethamsanqa kuyo yonke into.
解曰: Yidla ngaphandle kweentlanzi. Ukuba nyulu nokonwaba kukuhlwempuzeka. Lindela iTetra Pak. Amandla kunye nabantu.
籤詩故事一:
◇Isisa sihlangana neNkosi
Kwi-Tang Dynasty, uXue Li (614-683), igama lembeko uRengui, wazalelwa eLongmen, eJiangzhou (ngoku eyiHejin, eShanxi).
UXue Rengui wajoyina umkhosi izihlandlo ezithathu, ekhonza kuphela njengejoni lokutya.
Xa uMlawuli uTaizong (uLi Shimin) woBukhosi baseTang wayeleqwa nguGaisu, wayesengozini waza wahlangulwa nguRengui.
Oko kukuthi, wabizwa ngokuba nguMarshal nguMlawuli uTaizong weTang Dynasty, wakhokela imikhosi ukuya empuma, kwaye wafumana izinto ezininzi zokulwa emkhosini.
聖意: Umzi awumfanelanga umntu uyathandeka uyathandeka uyathandeka kunzima ukuba nethamsanqa kunzima ukurhweba kunzima umtshato uqhelekile uLiujia ukhuselekile abantu bakufutshane nentsimi intshulube zesilika ityalwe kwangethuba.Imfuyo emithandathu yonakele.abantu abakho.Amatyala oluntu ayathetheleleka.Imfuduko ilungile.Impahla elahlekileyo ilungile.Izigulo zifunyenwe.Thumela kwingcwaba lentaba ukuze uxolo.
